item.description:
Please come to mix and mingle and celebrate the Lunar New Year. We have a lot of new members that have joined recently. Enjoy a buffet dinner with delicious appetizers, main dishes and sushi. We will have the private function room reserved exclusively for our meetup group. And we will have some dance music as well. Cash Bar or waitstaff will take your drink orders.

If you are new to the group we hope you will join us. All members are welcome. You will definitely get a chance to meet with many members.

 

Cost is $20/person (Cash only) which includes tax & tip & room rental. Payment will be made when you arrive and sign in. Please only RSVP if you plan to attend.

Parking - there is plenty of street parking (meters) on Beacon St.

By T - take C train on Greenline to the St. Paul St. stop. BuddaC is right at that stop.

And please remember to update your RSVP if your plans change. We do have a no-show policy (removal).
item.how_to_find_us: We have the private function room reserved.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Welcome new members and Lunar New Year Dinner Celebration
